segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks quite flimsy, its legs splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really leaning into it, stretching far beyond his stable center of gravity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any moment, I expect it to tip backward and send him tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling onto that hard floor makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he hits his head or breaks something?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's water on the floor, making a fall even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is so unaware of the imminent danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just wants a cookie; she doesn't see the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a truly frightening situation to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of panic just watching him try to balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really turn around and see this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness is quite frustrating in this critical moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stabilize that stool immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene gives me a knot in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
